options.name: browser_url
options.description: URL to this event’s page on the Action Network or a third party

options.name: description
options.description: Description of the event. HTML supported.

options.name: end_date
options.description: End date and time of the event

options.name: featured_image_url
options.description: URL to this event’s featured image on the Action Network

options.name: instructions
options.description: Event's instructions for activists, visible after they RSVP. HTML supported.

values.name: primary
values.description: Whether this is the person's primary address

values.name: address_lines
values.description: Line for a person's address

values.name: locality
values.description: City or other local administrative area. If blank, this will be filled in based on Action Network's geocoding.

values.name: region
values.description: State or subdivision code per ISO 3166-2

values.name: postal_code
values.description: Region specific postal code, such as ZIP code

values.name: country
values.description: Country code according to ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2. Defaults to US.

values.name: language
values.description: Language in which the address is recorded, per ISO 639

values.name: latitude
values.description: Latitude of the location of the address

values.name: longitude
values.description: Longitude of the location of the address
